member.name: M:Volvo.NVS.Integration.WebsphereMQ.InputChannel.PeekSubscribe(System.Action)
member.summary: Subscribe and get a notification when a message is available.
member.param: The method to be called when message arrives
member.exception: Problems with communication to queue manager.

remarks.para: In case when application needs to be informed about incoming messages without "touching" them or custom message handling is needed use PeekSubscribe method instead of Subscribe.

PeekSubscribe starts new thread and call registered callback (action) each time when new message arrive. Callback method receives only message info (without content) defined by IMessageFilter interface to distinguish them from normal Subscribe.

member.name: T:Volvo.NVS.Integration.WebsphereMQ.Content.MqMdPassThroughWriter
member.summary: Setups MQMD integration message header properties on the .
member.remarks: A special type of the MQMD header writer is needed for the WMQ based channels as for the WMQ we do not have to write the MQMD header itself. This is done by the implementation. We need to however correctly set properties related to the IBM message class and the MQMD header so we correctly point at the next message part being written.

member.name: M:Volvo.NVS.Integration.WebsphereMQ.Content.MqMdPassThroughWriter.Write(Volvo.NVS.Integration.IUri,Volvo.NVS.Integration.Utilities.IMessageStreamWriter,Volvo.NVS.Integration.Messages.Message,System.Byte[],Volvo.NVS.Integration.Content.Writers.MessageWriterFormatInfo)
member.summary: Writes a message header or content.
member.param: A current uri for which the write operation is performed.
A target giving access into the message stream into which we should write.
A source message from which we should take properties and write them.
A current source message content which should be added into the target.
A name of the format supported by a writer being next in the queue (a next writer format).

member.summary: Provides information about a format supported by the writer.

member.returns: An object describing a format of the message being supported by the writer.

The stream does not support reading.
Methods were called after the stream was closed.
An I/O error occurs.

member.name: T:Volvo.NVS.Core.Configuration.IntegrationLibraryWebsphereMQConfigurator
member.summary: Extends the common configuration interface with the NVS Integration library configuration methods specific to WebsphereMQ.

remarks.para: You never use this type directly. You use extensions methods provided by this class via types implementing the which is extended by the .
